title: Fragment, late 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: compound twill with discontinuous supplementary weft patterning (brocade)
creditline: Gift of Mrs. DeWitt Clinton Cohen
description: Coral ground with a figure in green and white; fragmentary design of parasol, streamer, rushes, and a wreath.
